mapper.insert: insert into raffle_activity_account_month(user_id, activity_id, month, month_count, month_count_surplus) values(#{userId}, #{activityId}, #{month}, #{monthCount}, #{monthCountSurplus})
mapper.select: select * from raffle_activity_account_month where user_id = #{userId} and activity_id = #{activityId} and month = #{month}
mapper.update: update raffle_activity_account_month set month_count_surplus = month_count_surplus - 1 where user_id = #{userId} and activity_id = #{activityId} and month = #{month} and month_count_surplus > 0
